Police confirm potential sightings of missing Tauranga man Harley Shrimpton https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/police-confirm-pottial-sightings-of-missing-tauranga-man-harley-shrimpton/FGNOUDE2OFGWPLIPLMMKLPCSNI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/police-confirm-pottial-sightings-of-missing-tauranga-man-harley-shrimpton/FGNOUDE2OFGWPLIPLMMKLPCSNI/ Sandra ConchieHe was last seen by family members in Tauranga around two weeks ago. Sat, 18 Nov 2023 22:05:30 +0000 Police are appealing for reports of sightings or other information to help them locate Tauranga man Harley Shrimpton, who was last seen on November 3.
